title: Extreme Games Manager 1.0.3.9 (1-click run)(registred)
description:
No need to install,
No need to put serials and cracks to get the full version, (already done it for you).
No unnecessary registry changes, 
No boring installation of tool-bars in your browser,
You can even run this torrent from USB-Stick.
This makes a '1-click run' version a better version.

eXtreme Games Manager is probably the most advanced Electronic/Board Game collection manager around. It can import all Game Information from many specialized webistes. Just write the Game Title or Scan the Barcode!
